nodes.text: Mk II Anti-concussive armor, known as "Steelskin" was a model of non-powered personal armor. The armor cost 6,500 credits and was one of the heaviest models of non-powered armor available for sale. Because of the weight of the armor, most warriors were not strong enough to fight in the armor for a long period of time.
Mk II Anti-concussive armor was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
